page.title: 14Community Police.
page.content: There is a policeman who lives in the police bungalow at Indian Queens.He is called P.C.Chris.Humpleby.He is there to keep law and order in the district and to help people.He also helps with the traffic in the summer.If he is not available either P.C.Stan Christophers or P.C.Dave Hall,both from St.Columb, will come and help.If you cannot get P.C.Humpleby on the phone you have to ring the police station at Newquay who will speak to one of the others by the radio.The police have a lot to do,so they drive white Ford Escorts to make sure they can go all around the area. P.C.Dennis Stone comes into school every year.He tells the children about the police and their work,and shows a video called "Never Go with a Stranger".P.C.Stone is called the School Liason Officer.
